kv15.9:1.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittanti?
kv15.9:1.5: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittanti?
kv15.9:1.7: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṃ cittaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:2.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:2.5: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:2.7: Aphassakassa kālaṃkiriyā, avedanakassa kālaṃkiriyā …pe… acittakassa kālaṃkiriyāti?
kv15.9:2.11: Hañci saphassakassa kālaṃkiriyā …pe… sacittakassa kālaṃkiriyā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:3.3: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:3.5: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ na kameyya, satthaṃ na kameyya, aggi na kameyyāti?
kv15.9:3.7: Hañci saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ na kameyya, satthaṃ na kameyya, aggi na kameyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:4.3: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:5.3: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na kālaṃ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:5.5: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na kālaṃ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:6.3: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṃ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:6.5: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṃ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
